text: occurs when screen is too small to show the extension in the toolbar
can’t tell by the video are the buttons un-clickable when that happens?
nvm reproduced the problem very bizzare

honestly I’m not sure what I can do about it. will try to report it to the Chrome team, it appears what’s happening is your clicks are clicking through the popup window to whatevers below it. seems like multiple chrome extensions have this problem

Sent Chrome bug report as I think it’s actually a bug on the browsers part not the extension and I don’t think I can override this functionality because I think it’s a bug due to a security feature of chrome(basically chrome extension popups aren’t supposed to be able to cover the 3dot menu, preventing an extension from making that inaccessible. that menu should go away in some way when you click an extension to allow the extension to do it’s thing).
i thought it may be a chrome thing
